text: "The womb is a social-construct.." - a lunatic.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Again: just more childish waffle, a wholesale attempt to evade the social question at hand and reduce the entire 'discussion' (which you chose to begin) into childish name calling & personalised pop psychology. Literally yawning, long day at work, so it's mute o'clock, cheerio.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Still making things up, tough guy?
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Ps: I haven't the least care for what anonymous twitterers think of my personal 'capacities'. And while your concern (feeble judgement) is cute, its also entirely irrelevant to anything.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: You've completely omitted anything to do with your original warped contention and have instead waffled off a feeble attempt to insult and then narcissistically accuse others of insulting you, like I said already: shallow and boring.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: You seem incapable of holding two thoughts in your head at the same time: Trump is an outlier in terms of form, but exactly the same as Obama or Bernie in terms of substance, which is imperialistic, not simple 'white supremacy'.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: You 'ignore the work' of those who've been analysing imperialism-capitalism for centuries, and substitute it all for racial idealism. It's very boring and shallow.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: You're making a fetish of 'white supremacy' and thus the volk concept of 'race' as if this were the cause of imperialist class oppression, but it is simply one of many ideal expressions. Infantile idealism.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: You're an idiot clutching at straws. 'White supremacist discourse' is 'liberal-imperialist  discourse'--there's no real distinction between them beyond platitude & demagogy--the CLASS ROOT of both trends  is the same, it is YOU making that false distinction, no one else.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: The only bizarre thing is your claim either of us have ever 'been unwilling to acknowledge hte white supremacist character of the us imperialist project throughout its history' - that is a figment of your wild imagination, and that alone.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: "Trump is an outlier" -- in terms of his overt white supremacism in comparison to the generally less overt but equally if not more barbaric liberal variety of Obama, HRC, et al. Your base misrepresentations are just laughable at this point.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Ah I see, cheers. Hard to keep up with all Omidyar's minions these days, suppose that's partly the point of constantly deploying new faces.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Is that Jones' new outlet you mean?
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Alas, digital enclosures of imperialist 'social media' dictate that for many the only means of combating toxicity is at least partly from within it..
author: PhilGreaves01

text:
"Almighty 'israel' is dragging poor peacenik America into Syria's Golan Heights! Never before have the Noble European-Americans sought to colonize a thing!!"

So goes the inevitable pundit chorus...
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Cos you're a coward, too?
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Shut up colonizer.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: "The people in the Golan Heights" are loyal to their President & State, who've fought off Zionist-backed death-squads for a whole decade. These cretins speak for no one but their colonizer selves.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Syrians & all progressive humanity will never recognize the 'sovereignty' of a Yankee-European Zionist colony on Syrian and. Sooner or later you will meet the same fate as your long-lost 'rebel' puppets.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: As long as its profitable to their careers.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Perfectly apt for them to host eurovision; 'israel' is the quintessential expression of fascist european colonialism, hidden from most europeans, when not glorified.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: So lets assume @akalamusic's "good faith" to all men, what is the "good faith" explanation for him ignoring evidence of Owen Jones fabricating atrocities by the hands of Qaddafi, whom Jones called a "Savage Dictator" and openly approving of his overthrow, "dead or alive"?
author: PhilGreaves01

text: No sorry i dont have any "good faith" in discussions about Owen Jones, i am only faithful to the truth; that he is an imperialist cretin who consistently enables NATO war & the imperialist exploitation of the working-class.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Only people arguing (running away to Oxbridge) in 'bad faith' are you & your pal Owen Jones.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: You weren't invited to profess your care or lack thereof, but ill kindly invite you to fuck off Dean, you cretin.
author: PhilGreaves01

text:
Why do we think @akalamusic deleted his tweet linking to mine which exposes Owen Jones as an imperialist who cheered for NATO lynching Qaddafi?

Cos Owen told him to?
Cos of a few trolls?
Cos Owen called me a 'deranged crank'?
Cos it might hurt his celebrity?
Other..?
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Yes of course, many years ago. He much prefers scurrying around gossiping and calling me 'deranged' without right to reply, such is the general character of bourgeois pundits.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: What's disappointing is that @akalamusic simply took Owen's word for it, he simply deleted his tweet without seeking evidence, & despite me providing that evidence he sneaks off & sides with POWER. The POWER of Jones' celebrity & his capitalist platform.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: The point here is not about any lack of judgement on @akalamusic 's part, but to show what a critical role pundits like Jones play in perpetuating imperialist violence & valorising capitalist media by playing 'antimedia' within it, but actually being a NATO parrot.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: I have no reason to answer them, (which has been asserted), cheerio Dave.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Yes im "out to get" wealthy media pundits who enable NATO genocide, sorry if that upsets your sensibilities.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: So if you're not trying to champion Owen Jones or make excuses for his disgusting public screeds against oppressed nations, what is the point of your questions?
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Has he explained why he's deleted it?
author: PhilGreaves01

text: What a silly view. Owen Jones is a public media figure, its his job to market long-planned NATO policy, not direct it.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: No it isn't possible that's imperialist 'third way' sophistry, long debunked. You can't be "against" NATO attacking a country while also being for attacking the only real means of defending that country, ie: the State, the army, the leader, 'the regime', etc.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Lets not forget Jones also whooped with ecstatic joy for NATO's imposition of literal Nazis in Ukraine..
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Its not @akalamusic im criticising, tho im sure he & others have taken it that way, but the way in which pundits like Jones perpetuate 'the media', its lies & corruption, precisely by falsely posing as 'anti-media', despite Jones being a NATO parrot for much of his career.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Oh well that's alright then, he "only" helped NATO publily justify that 'military involvement' (genocidal war).
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Im not "diminishing Akala", i'm exposing his interlocutor as part of the problem Akala is touching on.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Who is "we"? @akalamusic is an increasingly popular public figure, not just some bloke having a chat. When he discusses imperialist violence with Jones he ought to point out Jones' role in perpetuating it, just as he should with Piers Morgan or Murdoch, etc.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Haha, that gambit has long been debunked. Libyans did not rise up against Qaddafi in any great number, & those who did were being used by NATO death-squads who went on to exterminate the black population of Tahwergha, save your genocide apology for idiots.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Have you read it? His "case against bombing Libya" was to declare Libya's leader a "Brutal Unhinged Dictator" and that "we all Qaddafi overthrown, dead or alive". That is a case FOR bombing Libya, not against.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: All it took was Owen Jones calling me a "deranged crank" & a few Labour Party trolls for @akalamusic to apparently drop all interest in evidence of Jones' pundit criminality & declare his Oxbridge friend a fine 'socialist' indeed. Pity these fools.
author: PhilGreaves01

text:
Curious, now @akalamusic is deleting tweets too,.. He seems to be having second thoughts on Owen's overt support & bloodlust for NATO's destruction of Libya, (& Syria) despite plentiful evidence... 

http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:hoOW2_h2_tMJ:https://www.leftfutures.org/2011/03/the-case-against-bombing-libya/ …

So disprove it,... 

"Let’s be clear. Other than a few nutters, we all want Gaddafi overthrown, dead or alive." - http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:hoOW2_h2_tMJ:https://www.leftfutures.org/2011/03/the-case-against-bombing-libya/ …
author: PhilGreaves01

text: It isn't fake, he deleted it.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: If he was merely 'mistaken' why doesn't he own up to it in order to teach others to avoid such 'mistakes', as opposed to denying it & erasing evidence from the internet? (cos that's not profitable for pundits).
author: PhilGreaves01

text: No that is not my point, that's your strawman. My point is that people like @akalamusic should be careful who they mix with in the media, simple.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: He claimed Qaddafi was "killing his own people", a "Savage Dictator", etc, parroting NATO lies. Evidence is in his tweets & the blog he deleted, which you can find on wayback...
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Define "opposed"...? (Preaching "neither NATO nor the rayjeem" in NATO media aint it, son).
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Not sure you understand the meaning of the word "fabricated", Dave, and sorry, i wont be 'sitting down' on your orders, old boy...
author: PhilGreaves01

text:
Fair enough then, no one expects you to know everything, but it might be worth you checking on those in the media, 'left' or otherwise, whom you entertain. One hopes you'll ask Owen for evidence of his outlandish slurs against me under your tweet, too. 

https://twitter.com/akalamusic/status/1108719823540891648 …
author: PhilGreaves01

text: He's deleted it, as he also deleted the blog where he stated: "we all want Qaddafi overthrown, dead or alive."
author: PhilGreaves01

text: At least @akalamusic doesnt call for 10,000's more capitalist coppers to persecute & imprison poverty-stricken workers, unlike you.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Just remember everyone; an imperialist financial union with 27 other largely white european States intent on exploiting 'lesser nations' & who recently imposed slavery on Libya is the height of 'anti-racism'. So says liberalism.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Fine, to clarify: i use the term "activist" disparagingly, in the same way as "careerist" or "pundit". There are hundreds of bame activists all over the media, what there are not are bame Communists or class conscious workers, or white Communists & workers for that matter.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Hahaha, "If if if". He can't even stop his own councillors from plundering social-housing or his own MP's cheering for war. He is not going to stop the ruling class breaking "international law" or UN treaties.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Nonsensical. He is being embraced, he is a black activist, his promotion in the media only further proves your assertion "black/bame activists have been ethnically cleansed from the media by the media." to be false.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Irrelevant. Your initial statement: "bame activists have been ethnically cleansed from the media by the media." is self-evidently false. It is not about race but about CLASS. Black bourgeois liberals & social-democrats, not to mention black Tories, are "embraced", as you noted.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: It is the class conscious working class & the communist vanguard of all races who are barred from capitalist media, not simply "black & bame artists". Simple.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Then it makes even less sense: you said black & bame artists were being "ethnically cleansed" from media, & then contradicted yourself by saying akala - a black man - is being "embraced" by the same media.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: He leads a Party loyal to a State that is responsible for the murder, maiming & exploitation of hundreds of millions of oppressed people. That he runs an allotment & spouts liberal platitudes is entirely irrelevant.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Why use black/bame then when its communists & workers of all races who are barred from bourgeois media?
author: PhilGreaves01

text: When Owen Jones fabricated lies to justify NATO's murder of 10,000's of Libyans & their leader he didn't need to explain it, all he had to do was call Qaddafi a "Savage" in the knowledge his ignorant largely white audience would gobble it up. @akalamusic
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Akala himself & many other bame artists & activists being in the media shows your prior statement to be somewhat false: Communists & workers - of all races - are cleansed from the media. One can be any colour as long as one is pliable &/or a liberal of some sort.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: For @akalamusic ongoing British imperialism, naked plunder & domination, is merely "regressive foreign policy", or "regime change", imperialism has ended! All that remains is mere "interference"! Did Owen Jones write the entire script??
author: PhilGreaves01

text: And promo from King Corbyn in the same week,.. coincidence is no coincidence in the realm of capitalist media.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Its also funny that despite @akalamusic 'following' my account, he hasn't once responded to any critical questions put his way, far easier to talk shit in the past tense with racist Oxbridge pundits i suppose.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Does @akalamusic think imperialism is all something of the past? Why is everything couched in the past tense, as if cretins like his mate Owen Jones aren't perpetuating racist imperialist violence when they cheer on NATO wars of conquest in Africa?
author: PhilGreaves01

text: The media's new darling activist @akalamusic sat down with Owen Jones to talk about empire & violence, needless to say he didn't mention Jones whooping with joy at UK-NATO's recent lynching of an African revolutionary.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Corbyn now epitomises all that is counterrevolutionary in 'left' garb: conciliation to capital, blackmail of workers, fear of taking even the most timid step against the imperialist status quo, appeasement & servile worship of the Dominant Order.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: One thing is for certain, the brexit vote & a real exit could have precipitated a revolutionary situation in Britain, and it was Corbyn & the rotten pro-EU Labour Party in league with many a Tory who crushed the movement before it had even found its feet.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: If it were a question of "Leave = crises & revolt in Britain" or "Remain = prolonged 'stable' fascism across the whole of europe", then the social-democrats will always choose fascism over 'revolting workers'. And it may well turn out to be that conundrum.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Corbyn & the social-democrats are actively strengthening european fascism in two ways: 1) by strengthening the alliance of european finance capital, the bedrock of fascism, & 2) by pushing workers who rightly loathe the EU Cartel into the arms of demagogues like UKIP.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: You & May are both pro-EU lackeys.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: "A compromise alternative!" - Not only to May's deal, which is just a foil, but a wholesale "alternative" to leaving the EU.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: 17.4 million voted to leave, with or without a 'deal'...
author: PhilGreaves01

text: How can you still lend this spinless imperialist lackey any support, genuinely intrigued as to what you think you're ever going to gain?
author: PhilGreaves01

text: "I am in Brussels today to meet EU leaders to discuss securing our alternative of a close economic relationship.." - ie: Corbyn is in Brussels (with pro-EU May) to put the finishing touches on the long planned bi-partisan scheme to render brexit meaningless.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: The 'no deal' fearmongers invoke May's deliberately 'bad deal' to bully & blackmail workers into accepting a 'deal' that amounts to remaining part of a 'close economic relationship' with 'an unaccountable european bureaucracy', which they voted to leave.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Look at her priorities: Yankee stormtroopers come before Iraqi civilians, 900,000+ of whom she has erased from the death toll. And the 'reputation' of US imperialism, as if before Iraq the Yanks weren't renowned imperialist mass-murderers. Disgusting.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Teenage projection is cute, but don't come here telling me I've been 'played' and then cry about condescension. Cheerio.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: If one is forced to pick hairs then 'those listed by Darren' are not the ruling class in general, but a small largely irrelevant faction thereof in comparison to the remain camp.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: That quote does not 'refute' ikhras' point as the context is completely different, Trump is an outlier not the typical executive (whose policies are no doubt the same but couched in liberal-imperialist exceptionalism as opposed to overt white supremacy).
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Small fry in comparison to Tony Blair et al + the ruling classes of 27 other capitalist States. It's you that's 'been played' laddy.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: It is a bourgeois myth that the British ruling class are 'divided' over brexit, they are only divided on how best to render the vote to leave meaningless & uphold their imperialist ties.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Every living British Prime Minister, the BoE, every head of British high-finance,  and a good 80% of British MP's all campaigned to remain in the Thatcherite EU Cartel of privatization & poverty, and so did Corbyn of course.

text: What does a 'non-rogue landlord' look like @jeremycorbyn??
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Promises promises, but what are the Labour Party doing right now, what have they been doing for the last decade? Plundering social-housing that workers built & paid for, rendering 1000's of tenants homeless &/or at the mercy of 'rogue landlords'...
author: PhilGreaves01

text: It is obvious to everyone that the 'Brexit Crisis' is primarily down to bourgeois parliament being overwhelmingly in thrall to the EU Cartel (imperialism) & seeking to remain in that Cartel by all means available, everyone apart from bourgeois pundits & their dupes, that is.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Yea, 'Susie Green' is a menace to women & children.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: This is irrelevant to ikhras' point. Which has been explained in simple terms; he's railing against liberal-imperialists who only 'oppose' overt white supremacists to prettify themselves.

text: No worries, the babbling 'stalin' is long blocked.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Capitalism will make it all worse. And leaving the imperialist EU is a prerequisite to ending capitalist exploitation & poverty in Britain.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: It is truly amazing to see 'lefts' belatedly realise there is no diversity of political opinion on the BBC all because @maitlis lied about a Labour invite, as if the last 60+ years of BBC Labour-Tory panto at the expense of everyone else never happened.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: There's no "distinguishing white supremacism from US imperialism". There is the simple materialist prioritization of imperialism as the driving force of ideology such as white supremacism &/or exceptionalism.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: No doubt many will say: "They're the same thing!", in any case, what must be fought is not mere ideology, but the material relations of imperialist class society, which such ideals are the general expression of.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Everything is designed to empower capitalists & thwart socialism, division is a major aspect of that of course, but the liberation of women isn't a 'distraction' from the pursuit of socialism, its part & parcel of that struggle.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: The trans-lobby & the British State, threatening to arrest women for speaking the simple scientific truth. Perhaps they'll bring back literal 'witch-hunts' after all...
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Why are you whining about such people unless you're implying my tweet is representative of such a view? It isn't relevant otherwise... ie: you're lecturing your own imagination, at length.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Whom is 'lecturing'?
author: PhilGreaves01

text: The point for Communists is not to simply praise spontaneous acts of indignation or resistance, but to better develop & organise them.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: If "those who doubt that certain acts seem to have bad results or just not accomplish much or anything, or seem not to be a perfect enough tactic." is directed at my tweet, then you haven't understood the point at all. Which is that 'such acts are good, but can be made better'.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Long criminal history, mental health issues, known to 'security services', just your regular GLADIO-ISIS patsy then...
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Cos Stalin was/is classified by western imperialists as a "Judeo-Bolshevik"/"Asiatic Despot" and not a "Pure Aryan". (And slandered relentlessly with fabricated Great Crimes, like "killing millions of his own", when in fact the Soviets under Stalin mainly killed German Nazis).
author: PhilGreaves01

text: ...racism is a by-product of capitalism." - Fred Hampton.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Its like saying: 'the idea of the loom is older than industry!' It doesn't matter, capitalists made race/racism more than a vague idea, they imposed it on society. And why invoke past tense, "used"? Capitalist empire (imperialism) still exists, & is still the bedrock of racism.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Putting certain forms of violence & social ill into neat little academic boxes obscures the totality of such phenomena, & its inherent relation to capitalist society.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: If this is to be known as 'SeriousViolence', what shall we call the British State's unsurpassed violence, the murder of millions? 'VeryVerySeriousViolence'? Why dont we just stop compartmentalizing violence in general, which is all ultimately a product of class society?

A brave young chap is #eggboy, but it proves that if you merely throw an egg, they will beat you unconscious.

author: PhilGreaves01

text: All those western pundits & politicians who perpetuate the myth of 'ISIS-Al Qaeda' NATO death-squads being some spontaneous expression of 'Muslim Rage' are also partly responsible for contemporary anti-Islamic Nazi fascism.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Western media is permeated with implicit fascism, from the 'right' to the 'left' the entire bourgeois gamut of 'culture, news & entertainment' is riddled with it, they make an exception of their overt Nazi confrere only to absolve themselves, not to root it out.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: "What on earth is the organ of British imperialism thinking giving fascists platforms, so unlike capitalist media to promote fascism!?" -
author: PhilGreaves01

text: This feigned naivety is precisely what allows the BBC & Co to continually absolve themselves of peddling fascism. As if its some anomaly, an egregious exception & not the longstanding rule.

text: "When @DavidLammy facilitated Britain's genocidal war on Libya, that was not terrorism, gentlemen, was it?"
author: PhilGreaves01

text: "When that Party of yours slaughters millions for the profits of British parasites, that is not terrorism, gentlemen, is it?"

text: All of them, as a class. Mercer is a small fry politician in comparison to a vulture like Bill Gates.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Corbyn openly expressed his "admiration for the courage, skill and devotion to duty.." of the British military - One has to be an utter simpleton or a brazen fraud to pretend this is mere "support for working class soldiers not their actions".
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Its called a comparison: Corbyn supported the British army's massacre in Iraq, as bad as supporting Zionist colonizers in Palestine. You pretend he merely supported "working class soldiers" and not their "actions". One refuses to 'debate' such moronic sophistry.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Be it entirely 'spontaneous' violence or overt/covert State fascism, it is the capitalists & the capitalists alone who pioneer & really NEED racism & fascism, it is capitalists who really NEED the masses fighting & scapegoating eachother for the bourgeois ruination of society.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: "Supporting working class Zionist soldiers is not the same as supporting Zionist genocide!" - That's your thickheaded 'argument' in favour of Corbyn's support for the British military murdering millions, it is grotesque. Calling you a moron is being kind.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: No, YOU are shielding an imperialist military with the individuals compelled to serve it. And YOUR babyish crying about alleged 'insults' only goes to show YOUR weak argument.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: The British Queen's military is not a "working class army", you moron.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: These pundits who prettify & perpetuate British imperialism - a foundation of racism & bigotry - are in no way 'anti-racists' or 'anti-fascists', they are simple self-serving hypocrites.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Owen Jones & the liberal 'left' imperialists are just as much an inspiration to fascists as their 'right' pundit friends, in some respects they are worse than the open fascists, because their 'left' fascism is more subtle & couched in self-serving liberal hypocrisy & deception.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: TELL YOUR WEALTHY COLLEAGUES WITH MASSIVE PUBLIC PLATFORMS.
author: PhilGreaves01

author: PhilGreaves01

text: Despite the pundits & the hypocritical platitudes of the liberal bourgeoisie, more & more workers are making the connection between non-State violence, 'terrorism' bigotry & racism, and the imperialist State, their wars & exploitation from which it stems.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Inevitably, the cretins cheering for 'White Europeanism' are blaming Brexit voters for Christchurch, while they desperately uphold an imperialist foundation of modern racism drowning refugees en masse.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: No socialist in their right mind believes in the hypocritical liberal concept of 'freedom of speech' under capitalism, nor do we abide Nazis 'freely' peddling their hate, Paul is just another reactionary imposter.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: WE keep trying to tell YOU pundits that it's YOUR capitalist bosses who produce & perpetuate bigoted hate, scapegoating of migrants & refugees, so don't blame it on some nebulous 'you' as if society at large is to blame.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: "Idpol" means "stuff that personally affects me"... and nothing more.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Zionism and Nazism; imperialist birds of a feather...
author: PhilGreaves01

text: And to perpetuate the alleged 'social' or 'autonomous' facade of modern digital media, creating a shield for said formal media & the ruling class itself. They're pointing at 'pewdepie' but 'pewdepie' & all his reactionary ideas are products of the bourgeoisie, as are the perps.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: The Terror Narrative is embellished with an implicit notion the perps influences are primarily from 'social media', (bourgeois digi-media in fact), precisely in order to draw attention away from the more profound impact of formal media (tv, print), pundits & politicians, etc.
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Nasrallah & the Communists were right, of course... US-NATO ramping-up the refurb & redeployment of 'ISIS' contras in occupied Syria-Iraq:
author: PhilGreaves01

text: Yes, they're not going to just throw such an asset away. They've been redeploying & refurbing them for years, eg:
author: PhilGreaves01

text: They are not merely 'involved', they are the greatest proponents of terror & violence in modern history.
author: PhilGreaves01
